articles.title: G.S. Kim Jong Il enjoys light comedy
Minju Joson on U.S. moves against DPRK
articles.content:
G.S. Kim Jong Il enjoys light comedy
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by artistes of the KPA April 25 Film Studio.
   The light comedy is based on heroic effort of KPA soldiers to give active help to the agricultural sector last year, true to the party's call.
   General Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction and thanked the performers for vividly representing a unique light comedy that is of great importance in cognition and education.
   He highly praised the creating staff and artistes of the studio for producing many films and light comedies of high ideological and artistic value and conducting revolutionary art activities vigorously in hearty response to the party's policy of Juche-based literature and art, so that they greatly contributed to the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces.
   He gave them important tasks to invigorate revolutionary art creation and activity.

articles.title: Student scientific research prize
articles.content:
Minju Joson on U.S. moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department on March 25 announced that it would supply 112 long-distance multiple rocket launchers to South Korea this year in addition to already-planned 168 rocket launchers of another shape.
   Branding this as a criminal move of encouraging the South Korean puppets to provoke a war against the DPRK, a news analyst of Minju Joson today says:
   The United States asserted that the deal would increase the military capacity of South Korea to cope with "threats from the DPRK." 
   However, their assertion is nothing but a pretext to justify the arms supply to South Korea.
   The U.S. arms supply plan, aimed at egging the South Korean puppets on to provoke a war against the DPRK,  is contrary to the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework.
   The United States is laying hurdles in the way of improving the DPRK-U.S. relations.
   It must stop encouraging the South Korean puppets to a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Encyclopedia of Juche idea shining with extraordinary philosophical intelligence
articles.content:
Student scientific research prize
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- 500 students across the country were awarded "student scientific  research prize"  today.
   This brought the number of the prize winners to 45   among them are Ryu Chol Jun, a student of the mathematics  and dynamics faculty of Kim Il Sung University who completed a valuable treatise helpful to the development of agriculture, Pak Chun Min, a student of the clinics faculty of the Pyongyang University of Medicine who presented a treatise conducive to the scientification of Koryo medicine, and candidate masters, inventors and honor students who distinguished themselves in study and scientific  research.

articles.title: Worldwide support for Korean people's cause of justice
articles.content:
Encyclopedia of Juche idea shining with extraordinary philosophical intelligence
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang-based papers today dedicate signed articles to the 16th anniversary of the publication of General Kim Jong Il's famous work "On the Juche Idea".
   The work contains the origin of the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the Korean revolution, its philosophical principle, its socio-historical principles, its guiding principles and its historical significance.
   It is a crystalline of Kim Jong Il's gifted ideological and theoretical intelligence, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
   Reflected in the work is the extraordinary intelligence of the general who always derives the new, not sticking to the established conception and formula.
   An outstanding idea and theory requires the original thinking of always creating the new while clearly penetrating all the achievements in the development of philosophical ideology of humankind.
   Creativity in the General's thinking and inquiry is an essential character.
    The philosophical principle of the Juche idea, its socio-historical principles and the guiding principles in the revolution and construction and other basic themes propounded in the work are original, not wedded to the established formula.
   The work also mirrors the extraordinary intelligence of the General who gives the popular masses a powerful weapon of struggle, a valuable sword of certain victory, proceeding from the requirement of the revolutionary practice.
   The General's philosophical thinking begins with the most urgent problem of our revolutionary practice at all times and all his ideas and theories represent the aspirations and will of the popular masses.
   Today the Juche idea has become an absolute truth which entirely accords with the demand and aspirations of the people, a true philosophy of the people which  is easy to understand and a powerful instrument of struggle.
   The General's ideological and theoretical intelligence is a clairvoyant one  which indicates immortal ideas and theories with vitality in future, too.
   It is his gifted intelligence to penetrate even the asiprations and desire of those who will live in the future with his outstanding observation and insight and to anticipate the trend of historical development tens of, hundreds of years ahead.
